Title: Military Parade
Publisher: Sichuan renmin chubanshe (四川人民出版社)
Notes: Marking the end of the North China Military Exercise, a large-scale military parade took place on September 19, 1981, at the airport of Zhangjiakou (张家口). Deng Xiaoping delivered a closing speech.This is a print from the second edition (January 1983).
